chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Seven-Striped Lass
chapters.info: Bromas, p. 152—Stately, dark-haired innkeeper of the Two Apples, an inn in Caemlyn near the city gates. Thom chose it for his performances while he and Mat were trying to lay low. She is Tylin's age; Mat thinks she might be a suitable mate for Vanin.
